mapper.select: SELECT sr.role_name, srm.menu_id, sm.name, sm.level, sm.pid, sm.permission FROM sys_role sr left join sys_role_menu srm on sr.role_id = srm.role_id left join sys_menu sm on srm.menu_id = sm.menu_id where sr.role_id = #{id}
select menu_id, name, permission, level, pid, created_time, update_time, is_enabled from sys_menu where is_deleted = 0

select rm.menu_id from sys_role_menu rm where rm.role_id = #{roleId} and rm.menu_id not in (select m.pid from sys_menu m inner join sys_role_menu srm on m.menu_id = srm.menu_id and srm.role_id = #{roleId})
